name: users.toml

page.name: Users Page
page.description: Page for managing system users with CRUD operations

list: View all users in card grid

rawContent:
[page]
id = "users"
name = "Users Page"
description = "Page for managing system users with CRUD operations"
path = "/prototype/users"

[page.features]
list = [
  "View all users in card grid",
  "Add new users",
  "Delete individual users",
  "Bulk delete all users",
  "Generate fake users for testing",
  "Reset to mock data"
]

[relations]
components = ["user-card"]
entities = ["user"]
events = ["user-create", "user-delete", "user-populate"]

[implementation]
component = "UsersPage"
file = "core/app/src/pages/prototype/UsersPage.tsx"
preview = "/prototype/users"
status = "implemented"
